GLU Documentation

GLU is a suite of tools for statistical geneticists, epidemiologists, statisticicians and analysis working with large sets of Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) in order to find associations between specific variants and specific phenotypes.

This is the documentation for GLU {{ release }}{% if last_updated %}, last updated {{ last_updated }}{% endif %}.
